Humans could use this technology to cheat death and live longer than ever before, potentially leading to overpopulation and strain on resources.
People could choose to age quickly in order to retire early and pursue other interests, but this could also lead to a shortage of skilled workers.
The ability to change biological age could be used for medical purposes, such as reversingious damage or treating age-related diseases.
Humans could use this technology to create a society where everyone is the same age, leading to a homogenous culture with no diversity in age.
The technology could be used for nefarious purposes, such as creating an army of super-soldiers or creating a society where only the young are allowed to participate in important decisions.
